# Contributing

Thanks for your interest in contributing to this project! We welcome improvements, fixes, and new ideas that align with the goals of this repository.

If youâ€™ve found a typo, a bug, or have a suggestion, feel free to [open an issue](../../issues/new) or submit a pull request. Please make sure your contribution follows our guidelines below.

## Contribution Guidelines

- âœ… **Fork the repository.**
- âœ… **Clone your fork locally.**
- âœ… Create a new branch with a meaningful name (e.g., `fix-doc-typo`, `add-ci-step`, or `improve-performance-logging`).
- âœ… Make your changes in that branch.
- âœ… Ensure your code follows our existing style and passes all checks (CI, lint, security scans if any).
- âœ… Open a pull request (PR) to the `main` branch with a clear description of the change.

## Pull Request Requirements

Before submitting a PR, please:

- Ensure your code or documentation is clear and concise.
- Link to related issues if applicable.
- Include test coverage or examples for new features if needed.
- Avoid submitting large features without prior discussion.
